name.description: The name of the role policy. If omitted, Terraform will

name_prefix.description: Creates a unique name beginning with the specified

policy.description: The inline policy document. This is a JSON formatted string. For more information about building IAM policy documents with Terraform, see the [AWS IAM Policy Document Guide](https://learn.hashicorp.com/terraform/aws/iam-policy)

role.description: The IAM role to attach to the policy.

id.description: The role policy ID, in the form of `role_name:role_policy_name`.

policy.description: The policy document attached to the role.

role.description: The name of the role associated with the policy.
